amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to repeal section 115 of the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to repeal section 115 of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 336 (Roll no. 173).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 336 (Roll no. 173).
